Articles.Content: Stupid question- how to I add to a current bug tracker report? Is it the edit button at the top, which seems to me to be a scary option haha. Also, if the issue has spanned 1.1-1.1.2 should I just add to the original?

Yes, use the "New issue"-Button if you have something new. If you have additional info, just add it to the original report

Edited May 1, 2016 by rudi1291
